\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 40882}

\subsection*{Really Bad Trip}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{TrippyGal}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 2 tablets & oral & Pharms - Sertraline & pill / tablet\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 1 tablet & oral & Pharms - Sertraline & pill / tablet\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 1 tablet & oral & Acetaminophen & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 130.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I don't ahve much experience with drugs, some cannabis and that's about it. So for first timers Zoloft is really not recomended. It may look as if it is a light drug, but is really strong. For me it was too much, I was pale as a ghost, my pupils fully dilated I wanted to puke all night long and couldnt sleep until 7 in the morning, I took the pills about 1 am, took 2 first, then I thought they were not doing anything so I took the third one and that is when they really kicked in. It was a really bad experience, my jaws were tense and hurt for about 2 days.  I really dont recommend this. Very bad trip.

\end{document}
